categories: Category:Lords of the Lost Tribe of Sith

nodes.text: Ysadria Kaladris was a Sith Lord of the Lost Tribe of Sith, and among the most trusted of Grand Lord Darish Vol's advisors in the Circle of Lords. It was Kaladris who debriefed the members of the Lost Tribe that returned to Kesh alongside Gavar Khai. It was also Kaladris that Lord Vol ordered to further monitor Khai for any signs of treachery.
